html:
1.19.18  11:55 am   Why is ur music kind of a little ting minescule of a bit strange

     to make it interesting

1.19.18  10:59 am   what are you doing when you are bored?

     i really should never be bored. i have an endless amount of content to complete, more than i'll ever have time to complete

1.19.18  9:22 am   Wow when i make a song i like i cant stop myself from listening to it over and over. It feels counterproductive and its probably not even good to anyone but myself but i love doin it

     the good news is you made a great song

1.19.18  8:30 am   Ignore every idiot?

     that is a bad strategy and also impossible because there is no way to exactly define who or what is 'idiot'

1.19.18  7:32 am   sometimes i feel like all of your songs are connected, in one way or another. i feel as if you wished you werent trapped in this comedian bubble

     i am not trapped in a comedian bubble. i was very careful never to enter it

      and your music was actually taken seriously and not just as a joke.

     my music is taken seriously, as well as whatever other ways people may prefer

     the visuals that accompany your videos are merely funny and maybe you dont to be seen as a musician that isnt taken seriously because of their sense of humour, and "i want to be a movie star" is about you wanting to be famous for somthjng that IS taken seriously,

     'movie star' was actually just a basic hook written for a vine, which never got made

      and la de da de da de da de day oh is about you reminiscing on the past when you were taken legitimately and life was all good and you didnt have to feel the pressure of people always demanding videos...

     that's not true, i just thought it would make a strong chorus after the pre-chorus line i already had, which was about 'writing a song'

     

but hey, thats just a theory,

A GAME THEORY

1.19.18  5:41 am   What's your biggest secret??

     if it's that big a secret, then a public page would be the wrong place to say it

1.19.18  5:31 am   Does having an audience impact your creative decisions?

     i hope not

1.19.18  5:01 am   Bill, how do you manage to put your incoherent lyrics together?

     i don't think they are incoherent, but i just try to imagine how i want the song to go

1.19.18  3:31 am   Is it hard to make original songs these days?

     no

     Most of your songs sound similar, just sayin'

1.19.18  2:39 am   are cats real

     i will check

1.19.18  2:38 am   whats your favorite atomic element

     the first one

1.19.18  2:34 am   did you always know you would be a musician?

     i already was

1.19.18  1:32 am   what is that one thing that must be set right to make the world a better place?

     you being born

1.19.18  12:58 am   will "i'm crazy / it's raining" make it onto your spotify?

     yes

1.19.18  12:56 am   Can u do a studio tour

     how about this

1.19.18  12:43 am   when do you plan on getting a better quality camera to use in those videos where you do show yourself in?

     maybe some other time

     what camera do you use now?

     i can't tell you

1.19.18  12:34 am   the windmill line in your new song seems a little out of place to me, so i was just wondering what the inspiration behind that line was?

     it felt to me like a good fit. for me there is bonus points when it feels like it fits but you can't explain what it means

1.19.18  12:32 am   I'm in college and everyone wants me to write "academically" and it's annoying because there are all these rules in academic writing that usually makes things you are trying to say even MORE vague.

     that's true

      can you tell all the academic people that it's not fair to make everyone else learn their language when it's THEIR jobs to make things easy for us dumb, unsophisticated folks to understand?

     ok i will tell them

1.19.18  12:09 am   what disappoints you

     my lawyers have advised me not to say

1.18.18  11:46 pm   If you could collaborate with anyone ever to make a song with, who would you want to do it with? It feels weird to have with in a sentence twice, but I think I'm sticking with it. wait

     collaboration has never worked for me

1.18.18  11:13 pm   Do you like me as a friend?

     who is this

1.18.18  11:06 pm   Hey bill, I know an accomplished composer/songwriter with a couple number ones. It'd be dope if you guys collaborated. He thinks your music is the raddest.

Would you be interested?

     you should tell him to email me

1.18.18  11:04 pm   have you figured out what icy james is yet?

     i didn't know at the time, but recently i was able to deeply psychoanalyze myself and i think i figured it out

1.18.18  10:59 pm   do you read poetry, bill?

     sure

      are your lyrics poetry?

     the reason i would say no is because they inseparable from the music. at least they are supposed to be

     what is poetry?

     you'll have to try and see

     is this question poetry??

     i'd say so

1.18.18  9:54 pm   How much an hour does it cost to rent you out as a friend?

     my friend ship is not for rent

1.18.18  9:52 pm   Do you have to force yourself to create

     no

     or does it feel natural to you?

     yes

1.18.18  9:45 pm   If my mom calls me a mistake should I take that as a compliment.

     that just means you were born without warning your parents first. which means you are bold and courageous, and are a patron of surprise

1.18.18  9:33 pm   That was a great video. Congrats! Your dedication and the way you make stuff is nearly as amazing as the stuff you make. What's next? If you need any kind of humanly doable help, just shout, I'm right at the corner.

     i actually kind of do need that. but you didn't say which corner. do i need to go on craigslist missed connections or what

1.18.18  9:29 pm   Have you ever been recognized on the streets only by your voice?

     i usually don't talk in the street

1.18.18  9:21 pm   help me learn piano plz

     the piano will help you. it has been trying to help you this entire time, if you are listening

1.18.18  9:11 pm   I was messing around on my piano and fell in love with playing this scale: E F# G# A B C D E. What's it called?

     i will give you some ideas for names, but there is a person on this page currently in a feud with me over this, so i would emphasize one more time as always to please call this anything you want. i am only going to give you some ideas for what to call it. ok here are some ideas i can think of: E major on the bottom, minor on top. A melodic minor over E. a split screen with E major on the left and A minor on top. a split screen with E major on the left and E minor on top. i hope that helps

1.18.18  9:09 pm   are you a satanist?

     i don't know what that is but i don't think so

1.18.18  8:48 pm   How do you follow through when you feel frozen? What does that conversation with yourself look like?

     about like this

1.18.18  8:34 pm   do you like it when people send you links to interesting music?

     all music is interesting

1.18.18  8:14 pm   Hey bill. I am kind of a dreamer and I don't quite understand how I developed the mindset I did, being surrounded by so many people who think differently than me, but I'm really happy I did. I just believe more that everybody's special and should do what they want to do in life, regardless of their status and that they have the power to achieve that. But each time I bring this up, my whole family tries so hard to bash into my head that this is the wrong way to approach the world and it really upsets me because I believe that my approach to the world is how one can achieve creation and innovation. Like if we had accepted how things were and never strive to change, us as a human race wouldn't be where we are now. And it saddens me when people around me try soooo hard to force me to think like what they do- don't stand out and accept things the way they are and so much bullshit in my opinion. I look up to a lot of people that inspire me, like you, and s o many o thers, and all the great things that surround me in my life that give me hope that I could push foreword and prove everybody around me wrong. That I can live the life I want, and that I could potentially make it and be like you or my other inspirations and bring more great things to the rest of the world. It's my main motivation in my life at the moment. But it's really hard with so many people surrounding me like this- telling me I shouldn't think this way. I don't agree with settling any less and living someone else's life and wasting what makes me unique and great. It's just difficult to find the time to put my energy into what I want to do with the many responsibilities I have already and With all of these people trying so hard to change me. I know my situation may not seem that bad, but It's kinda driving me crazy. Stressing me out. Sometimes my hope dwindles because of this. I want to breakthrough and prove all of these people wrong, but it's always inevitable that my energy a lways crashes and my hope fades and I fall apart. My question is how do you push through when it seems that the world around you is so against you? What advice do you think would help me Persist? 

     make in a t.v. show where you must persist despite the world seeming against you

1.18.18  8:12 pm   are you a YouTuber

     i've never been tested

1.18.18  7:59 pm   How to end bad cycles where you are going nowhere?

     in 200 ft, exit the roundabout

1.18.18  7:36 pm   I don't think you were clear enough before, are you running for president?

     no

1.18.18  7:32 pm   Am I eventually going to have to climb that mountain of learning the whole production-side of making music? When I record I just play into a shit mic that plugs into my computer and I have this interface thing (don't even know what you'd call that type of device) where I can record guitar or keys straight into the computer. I just use the standard recording program that just came with my computer (audacity).. i dont do anything with effects any editing apart from just adjusting the volumes of each track. I love writing and recording music, but the sound quality is always crap. Doesn't really bother me now. But again, I feel like at some point I'm going to have to climb that mountain of learning that side of making music. And it scares me because I don't know where and how to start or when I should just bite the bullet and dive head first into this world. 

     it depends if you want it to sound any better, but just make small steps. i'm sure there is at least one tiny thing you could do that you already know how to do to make it better. like let's say the drums sound too loud or something. then just turn down the drums a tad. etc, then find another little thing to change. unless you think it sounds ok the way it is, then don't change anything

1.18.18  7:22 pm   Do you prefer the deeper/ more personal questions, or the more silly ones,

     the software i am using does not make that distinction

     or do you just like answering any questions? Or I guess do you not like questions at all and you're some sort of ascetic?

1.18.18  6:52 pm   how do you make music?

     try a way you think none of your peers are expecting

1.18.18  6:38 pm   Sometimes I wanna go in there and ask the hell outta some questions

     oh, that's what i'm talkin about

1.18.18  6:31 pm   What is something valuable you've learnt making your latest song and video ?

     trying to make videos good takes way too long, i'm making them bad from now on

1.18.18  6:30 pm   How can someone who lives very far from where you live help you ? Apart from money ?

     that would depend on their skills / area of expertise

1.18.18  6:29 pm   How did you misspell La de da de da de da de day oh ?

     you don't wanna know

1.18.18  6:20 pm   When will you up the reality page? It's really nice hearing about you. 

     whenever i decide it's a good idea to make the regular main projects take even longer than they already do

1.18.18  5:47 pm   whats your favorite dog?

     under

1.18.18  5:34 pm   do you skip questions?

     yes

      if so why?

      because there are too many to ever answer

1.18.18  5:25 pm   I love the filler from 0:58 to around 1:02 in your newest video, is there any fancy theory behind it? Or are you just a master of cool chords.

     ah, that would be something of a weckular-oliverian snazblaster

1.18.18  5:22 pm   What is a goat?

     it's like a cow dog
